grammar_point: Cause and effect with 因为 and 所以
chinese: 因为奶茶里有很多咖啡因，所以人们爱上了奶茶。
english: People fell in love with milk tea because it contains a lot of caffeine.

grammar_point: Cause and effect with 因为 and 所以
chinese: 因为奶茶店选择的地点不好，所以没有人去买。
english: No one goes to buy milk tea because the location of the milk tea shop is not good.

grammar_point: Cause and effect with 因为 and 所以
chinese: 因为奶茶比咖啡便宜，所以有些人认为奶茶赚不到钱。
english: Some people think milk tea doesn't make money because it is cheaper than coffee.

grammar_point: Cause and effect with 因为 and 所以
chinese: 因为加班累了，所以年轻人喜欢喝奶茶。
english: Young people like to drink milk tea because they are tired from working overtime.

grammar_point: Cause and effect with 因为 and 所以

english: Competition is fierce because there are milk tea shops everywhere.
